value.title: Variables in DAX
value.excerpt: Using variables in DAX makes the code easier to read, faster, and easier to debug. Learn how and when to use variables, along with why they are so important in any DAX expression. Article and download: https://sql.bi/760161?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive

value.title: Create paginated reports
value.excerpt: Paginated reports allow report developers to create Power BI artifacts that have tightly controlled rendering requirements. Paginated reports are ideal for creating sales invoices, receipts, purchase orders, and tabular data. This module will teach you how to create reports, add parameters, and work with tables and charts in paginated reports.

value.title: Scope report design requirements
value.excerpt: Gathering appropriate inputs to scope your report design requirements involves identifying your audience, determining the suitable report types, and defining their interface and experience requirements. This module provides you with a strong foundation on which to learn how to plan your report design requirements.

value.title: Use visuals in Power BI
value.excerpt: Create and customize visuals to present data in compelling and insightful ways.

value.title: Avoid refresh errors when importing files in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you refreshed Power BI files and got errors due to missing columns or unwanted columns? Here I show you how to avoid new columns for getting added and refresh error from missing columns. value.title: Concatenate/ Merge columns with Power Query, the right way.

value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI.
